name: 🌟 Star Forge ⚡
description: Off The Grid solar powered pool. 3.4 kWh homemade 18650 Tesla Powerwall & 3 Raspberry Pi @ under 13 watts. Teaching the next generation open source is the $PATH & DeFi is the future. Check out our project and please delegate if you can. Thank you!

about.server: Mac M1 Mini native Linux! Raspberry Pi Relays, DIY Tesla powerwall, Starlink(coming soon), Off The Grid Solar Pool lest than 20 watts

name: Berry
description: Decentralizing Cardano in the most beautiful way - Let's shape the future together!

about.me: My name is Alessandro, I'm a single pool operator and a computer science student from Germany.
about.server: Berry is the first Stake Pool on Raspberry Pis and it's operational since the first day of Shelley. Here to truly decentralize Cardano in a power efficient way!

name: SBC-Mining
description: SBC-Mining - Everything about cryptocurrency / cryptomining on single board computers. All income will be used to test and host further projects for you.

about.me: Single pool operater from Germany. I try to generate some types of crypto on single board computers in different ways in order to enable people in countries where people are not doing so well and who have hardly any money the possibility of passive income. Therefore, 100% of all income goes into this and other projects
about.server: Raspberry Pi 4 8GB powered with green energy. My equipment currently consists of 1 Block Producer and 2 Relay Nodes. I can guarantee an excellent internet connection (Glasfiber 1Gigabit) whit fallback to LTE and a big Battery Pack for Power failure.

name: ADASRN
description: Growing wealth together. We keep costs low for the community with a 1% margin.

about.me: We are Malaysians who want to participate in the Cardano network as we believe DeFi is the future. We are donating some of our proceedings to charity once we are profitable. Follow our Twitter page to keep up with us.
about.server: We have 3 separate bare metal nodes which comprise of 2 Relay nodes and 1 Block producing node. All three nodes run on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS server edition for maximum reliability. We are excited to let you know that two of our nodes are run from Raspberry Pi 4B 8GB with binaries compiled from source for the aarch64 architecture. We also have an additional x86-64 linux-PC to act as a backup relay/block node if needed.
